versions.description: All IPA commands as .claude/skills/. Claude auto-invokes when relevant. Requires Claude Code with skills support.
versions.warning: Requires Claude Code with skills support (v2.0+). Not compatible with older Claude Code versions.

versions.description: Uses .claude/commands/ for /ipa:* slash commands. Compatible with all Claude Code versions.

versions.notes: Custom paths support (.ck.json), import external SRS, modular docs
